meta.title: Tangipahoa Parish Government | Tangipahoa Parish, LA

meta.name: DESCRIPTION
meta.content: Welcome to the Tangipahoa Parish Government website. Here you can find updated information about news, special projects, and our parish agencies.

strong.a: Click Here for Information About Coronavirus (COVID-19)

div.script: eds2_2(document).ready(function ($) { $('#SizeShifter968').sizeShifter({maxWidth: 800, transition : 'fade', fallback3d: 'sliceV', useThumbs: false, usePagination: false, useArrows: false, thumbMargin: 3, autoPlay: false, delay: 1500, transitionDuration: 800, startSlide: 0, keyNav: false, captionWidth: 50});});

div.div: Tangipahoa Parish lives, works, and plays together, building opportunities to help one another.

div.h2: What can we help you accomplish today?
div.h6: Click a link below to get started.

div.p: We are so proud to call Tangipahoa home! Although Tangipahoa is home to many great assets, I boast that our greatest asset is our people! This community lives, works, and plays together, building opportunities to help one another. We firmly believe Tangipahoa is the best parish in the state, and we know that once you see what we have to offer, you will want to MOVE HERE, too! Don’t hesitate to contact us; we are honored to serve you in person or online.

div.a: Click here for parish news and updates
Click here to view a staff directory
Click here to read information on special projects
Click Here for a video tour of the parish

img.alt: decorative icon to represent upward trending growth in Tangipahoa Parish
img.br: Tangipahoa is one of the fastest growing parishes in Louisiana.

img.alt: decorative icon representing the complete transportation infrastructure throughout Tangipahoa Parish
img.br: Deemed the “Crossroads of the South,” Tangipahoa has access to all forms of transportation.

img.alt: Decorative icon representing the world-class higher education in and around Tangipahoa Parish
img.br: There are 13 higher learning institutions an hour's drive from the heart of Tangipahoa.
